name: Tekki Shodan
description: The first Tekki kata, performed entirely in horse stance (kiba-dachi) with powerful hip movements. Tekki means 'iron horse' and this kata is known for its strong sideways movements while facing forward. The embusen is a straight line with all techniques performed facing north while moving left and right. This kata emphasizes strong hip action, balance, and the development of powerful techniques from a stable base.

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ よこふみこみ
subMoves.description: Execute right side stomp kick while moving into horse stance

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ よこ ちゅうだん はいしゅうけ
subMoves.description: Right side middle level back hand block

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん まええんぴうち
subMoves.description: On the spot, still in kiba-dachi, hit a left elbow (empi-uchi) in the open right hand. The hips remain in front.

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Left lower level sweeping block

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん かぎづき
subMoves.description: On the spot, always in kiba-dachi, make a punch right hook (kagi-zuki) average level. Bring the left fist back into hikeness.

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり よこふみこみ
subMoves.description: Left side stomp kick while moving into horse stance

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん うちうでうけ
subMoves.description: Right middle level inside forearm block

moves.japaneseName: Migi gedan-barai / Hidari jōdan nagashi-uke / Hidari jōdan ura-zuki

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Right lower level sweeping block

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり じょうだん ながしうけ
subMoves.description: Left upper level sweeping block

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり じょうだん うらづき
subMoves.description: Left upper level close punch, left elbow resting on the back of the right fist

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり なみがえし
subMoves.description: Turn the head to the left, make a kick sweep up the left foot (nami-gaeshi) to rest in kiba-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん もろてたてうけ
subMoves.description: Left middle level augmented vertical block, right fist always under the left elbow

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ なみがえし
subMoves.description: Orient the head to the right, kick upward sweeping from the right foot (nami-gaeshi) to rest in kiba-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん もろてそとうけ
subMoves.description: Left middle level augmented outside block, right fist always under the left elbow

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん もろてよこづき
subMoves.description: Orient the head to the left, bring the 2 fists in hikité, left vertical fist on the right fist, at the right hip, before performing on the spot a double medium-level fist attack, stretched left arm (yoko-zuki) and folded right arm (kagi-zuki)

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり よこ ちゅうだん はいしゅうけ
subMoves.description: Arm slowly and power the left hand under the right armpit and block with the left hand open (haishu-uke) middle level on the left. Right fist in hikité.

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん まええんぴうち
subMoves.description: On the spot, always in kiba-dachi, hit a right elbow (empi-uchi) in the open left hand. The hips remain in front.

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Right lower level sweeping block

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん かぎづき
subMoves.description: On the spot, always in kiba-dachi, make a left punch in hook (kagi-zuki) average level. Bring back the right fist in hikeness.

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ よこふみこみ
subMoves.description: Slowly cross the left foot in front of the right foot, heel raised. Put the left heel on the ground and then lift your right knee high and hit a crushing kick (fumikomi) right to get into the kiba-dachi position

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん うちうでうけ
subMoves.description: Left middle level inside forearm block from the inside out, middle level on the left. The hips and the look are from the front.

moves.japaneseName: Hidari gedan-barai / Migi jōdan nagashi-uke / Migi jōdan ura-zuki

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.description: Left lower level sweeping block

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん ながしうけ
subMoves.description: Right upper level sweeping block

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん うらづき
subMoves.description: Right upper level close punch, right elbow resting on the back of the left fist

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ なみがえし
subMoves.description: Turn the head to the right, kick up and sweep up the right foot (nami-gaeshi) to rest in kiba-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん もろてたてうけ
subMoves.description: Right middle level augmented vertical block, left fist always under the right elbow

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり なみがえし
subMoves.description: Turn the head to the left, make a kick sweep up the left foot (nami-gaeshi) to rest in kiba-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん もろてそとうけ
subMoves.description: Right middle level augmented outside block from the outside to the inside middle level, left fist always under the right elbow

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん もろてよこづき
subMoves.description: Orient the head to the right, bring the 2 fists in hikité, right fist vertical on the left fist, to the left hip, then perform on the spot a double attack middle-level fist, right arm extended (yoko-zuki) and left arm folded (kagi-zuki)
